DataElement.preferredName: Psychopathology Child Broad Questionnaire Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The branch of pathology focusing on mental illness and abnormal behavior._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._Very large in expanse or scope; having great extent from one side to the other._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
